labels.tip: (Please select an option from below to continue registration)

heading.divorced: Please provide as much details about your divorce
heading.annulled: Please provide as much details about your annulment as possible

reason.divorced: Please mention the reason on which the divorce was pronounced
reason.annulled: Please mention the reason on which the annulment was pronounced

reasonDefault.married: Please let other users know about the consent of your current spouse.
reasonDefault.awaitingDivorce: Please enter the status of the suit and likely dates for the ruling.
reasonDefault.divorced: Please enter the reason & date of divorce and the court that gave the verdict. Please provide as much information as possible. Half-explanations may lead to disqualification.
reasonDefault.annulled: Please enter the reason & date of annulment and the court that gave the verdict. Please provide as much information as possible. Half-explanations may lead to disqualification.

labels.show: Show to my accepted contacts/paid members

termsConditions.part3: and have read and understood the

messages.mandatory: Note:You have to fill up all fields on this page
messages.contactNumberMessage: We require at least one of the below

help.email: This is the email address we will use to communicate with you and you will login to the site using this address.
help.password: Please choose a password that has a minimum of 6 characters.
help.fullName: Please enter the first name and the surname. In case you do not have a surname, enter your parent's name. Your name will not be revealed to anybody.
help.displayName: Please enter the name by which you would like to be identified by other users (minimum 6 characters). This need not be your original name and it cannot be the same as your email id.
help.dtOfBirth: Please remember that the date of birth, once entered cannot be changed.
help.maritalStatus: Please choose "Married" only if you are a Muslim.
help.citizenship: Please select the country for which you hold citizenship.
help.suitableTimeToCall: Please let us know when would you like to receive calls. The time specified is Indian Standard Time
help.community: This is your identity. Enter the mother tongue/region combination that explains you best.
help.workArea: Choose your work area. In case your work area is not listed,choose 'Others'.You will be able to write in detail about your work on the next page.

email.invalid: Please enter email address in proper format eg: abc@def.com.
email.alreadyExists: This email is already registered in our system. To retrieve the username and password,
email.jeevansathiInvalid: You cannot register with a jeevansathi email address. Please register using a different email address.
email.blockedDomainName: The domain name you entered is blocked. Please register using a different email address.

password.error2: Password length should be between 6 and 16 characters
password.error3: Password cannot start or end with space(s).

confirmPassword.error3: Password cannot start or end with space(s).

fullName.error2: Full name cannot contain special characters.

username.characterStarting: Display Name should start with an alphabet.
username.minimumCharacters: Display Name should be of minimum 6 characters.
username.obscene: Display Name cannot contain any obscene words.
username.continuousNumerics: Display Name cannot contain more than 5 digits.
username.domainNameUsage: Display Name cannot contain any domain names.
username.specialCharacters: Display Name cannot contain any special characters. Only underscore(_) and period (.) are allowed.
username.alreadyExists: Display Name already exists, please try a different username.
username.sameAsEmail: The display name cannot be same as your email id.

sameEmail.sameAsEmail: The display name cannot be same as your email id.

dtOfBirth.error2: You must be atleast 21 years old to register to this site.
dtOfBirth.error3: You must be atleast 18 years old to register to this site.

partnerAge.error2: Partner min age should be less than partner max age.

mstatus.error2: Please choose married only if you are muslim.

submitErrorMessages.annulled: Please enter a valid annulled reason.
submitErrorMessages.partnerMstatus: Please choose preferred partner's marital status.

partnerHeight.error2: Partner min height should be less than partner max height.

countryCode.error2: Country code cannot contain special characters.

stateCode.error2: State code cannot contain special characters

phone.error1: Please type in a valid phone number.
phone.error2: Phone number cannot contain special characters. Only numbers are allowed
phone.error3: Phone number should contain atleast 6 digits.

phoneOwnerName.error1: Please enter the phone number owner's name.
phoneOwnerName.error2: Phone number owner's name cannot contain special characters.

submitErrorMessages.showphone: Please select your phone no. viewing option.

countryCodeMobile.error1: Please enter country code for mobile.
countryCodeMobile.error2: Country code for mobile cannot contain special characters.

mobile.error1: Please type in a valid mobile number.
mobile.error2: Mobile number cannot contain special characters. Only numbers are allowed
mobile.error3: Mobile number should contain atleast 10 digits.

mobileOwnerName.error1: Please enter the mobile number owner's name.
mobileOwnerName.error2: Mobile number owner's name cannot contain special characters.

submitErrorMessages.showmobile: Please select your mobile no. viewing option.
submitErrorMessages.suitableTimeToCall: Please select a valid suitable time to call. Begin time should be before end time.
submitErrorMessages.partnerDegree: Please choose preferred partner's highest degree.
submitErrorMessages.partnerIncome: Please choose preferred partner's annual income.

casteEntry.muslim: Please enter a valid math'thab. Special characters are not allowed.
casteEntry.christian: Please enter a denomination. Special characters are not allowed.
casteEntry.hindu: Please enter a caste. Special characters are not allowed.

submitErrorMessages.termsandconditions: You have to agree to the terms and conditions to proceed.
submitErrorMessages.forgotPasswordMessage: An email has been sent to this address with the account details. Kindly login using the same.
